title: hacked?
body: I think my account was hacked. I did not click on any weird links or go "down any rabbit holes". Tried to sign in and said invalid username/password combo. When I requested email to be sent via support, I received nothing. Ive spent a lot of $$$ and time. Is it lost? anyone have any experience with this?

replies.body: The same exact thing is happening to me right now, my password was changed for whatever reason, I tried to recover it and no email... Btw, did you ever recover your account??

That definitely doesn't sound good! If you reach out in a [**support ticket**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K), we'll be able to look into this and work with you to sort this out together.

If you run into any issues submitting your ticket, let me know.
